name: Dr. Michelle S, Thomas

jv_history.source_quote: to Michelle Thompson, Director of Executive Coaching and Consulting program who was featured in the "𝙒𝙞𝙣𝙩𝙚𝙧 ... Michelle Thompson

what_you_do: As a Global Keynote Speaker and Best-Selling Author, I had the privilege to travel the globe speaking on some of the most amazing stages.
who_you_serve: Women entrepreneurs looking to launch, build and grow their entrepreneurial dreams.
seeking: We are always looking for vetted ethical businesses to partner with, including women entrepreneurs looking to grow their clientele, professional business coaches, business service providers, national corporations offering business perks to women entrepreneurs, speakers for our events, and mentors.
signature_programs: The Exceptional Woman Network, The Exceptional Women's Academy, The Exceptional Woman Tour, Sixcess Industries Inc., Aecendt Global Marketplace
business_focus: Providing women entrepreneurs with the education, training, and financial building avenues necessary to build a thriving business.
service_provided: Keynote speaking, business education, business training, financial building, business consulting, mobile app development
